EmailTemplate.name: OptIn_Program_mih.AERO_Confirmation_SingleOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome! - Subscription Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOU'RE CONNECTED Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to {{lead.Signup:default=Honeywell Aerospace}} e-communications.*
That means you’ll be able to get exclusive updates about our offerings, news and events and special offers.
Can’t wait? Check our website here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>.
Thank you! Honeywell Aerospace
*E-communications refers to email, social media and digital advertising.
You can unsubscribe from our email communications at any time. To unsubscribe, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Unsubscribe_Confirmation.html]]>.
